channel.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
channel.description: At the beginning of this chapter across from the Silo D blast door there is a security office with a shotgun which I do not have yet (website said it becomes available in office complex but it is the magnum..not the shotgun). I want it and upon further observation in storage room 1 just past the Silo D area I can see that the light is green on the back door to this office and there is a vent above I believe I can crawl out of...go down the catwalk like area and down the stairs and gain access through the back secutiry door. If anyone is familiar and can tell me how to find the enterance to this vent that would be great. I have already tried breaking door windows and crawling through...I know it has to do with that vent...Thanks

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: NoyzRulz
item.description:
Thanks man! I tried to shoot it out, etc hoping that was it

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
oh. Doors break if an object is placed under them. It’s a known bug. Load an earlier save

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: NoyzRulz
item.description:
Thanks, but I did that on the many doors leading to here and tried it here as well. Door will not open. Pressed use, shot it, used the crowbar on it. The turret is jammed in there but I doubt that matters?

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
press use on the small panel next to the fire door. If that doesnt work, use a crowbar instead

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: NoyzRulz
item.description:
I know the answer will be easy but I am stumped. Stuck between storage room 2 and 3. Assumed the elevator was it but can’t grab the ladder, no pipes to climb on, etc. Thanks in advance.

1024×576 78.7 KB

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
the map may be over, but that doesnt mean you won’t come back to it

Read full topic

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: lightningline
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

Just keep going. It’s not a secret, it’s a room you’ll come upon later.

OK…thanks…another load point appeared so I assumed that map was over.

Read full topic
item.source: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection

item.description:
You get to that room later on, push forward.

Read full topic

item.title: We've got hostiles : all stuck post collection
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
lightningline:

At the beginning of this chapter across from the Silo D blast door there is a security office with a shotgun which I do not have yet (website said it becomes available in office complex but it is the magnum…not the shotgun). I want it and upon further observation in storage room 1 just past the Silo D area I can see that the light is green on the back door to this office and there is a vent above I believe I can crawl out of…go down the catwalk like area and down the stairs and gain access through the back secutiry door. If anyone is familiar and can tell me how to find the enterance to this vent that would be great. I have already tried breaking door windows and crawling through…I know it has to do with that vent…Thanks

Just keep going. It’s not a secret, it’s a room you’ll come upon later.

Read full topic
